original_text: A week later his disciples were in the house again, and Thomas was with them. Though the doors were locked, Jesus came and stood among them and said, “Peace be with you!”
korean_text: 여드레를 지나서 제자들이 다시 집 안에 있을 때에 도마도 함께 있고 문들이 닫혔는데 예수께서 오사 가운데 서서 이르시되 너희에게 평강이 있을지어다 하시고

sentences.original_text: A week later his disciples were in the house again
sentences.korean_translation: 일주일 후 그의 제자들이 다시 집에 있었고

sentences.original_text: Jesus came and stood among them
